comments:
I was playing around with the CVS connection, trying to learn how to use it. I 
tried "Synchronize with stream", and selected Release from the context menu on 
a file. Then I started playing around with the "Synchronization difference" (or 
whatever) window, making it a fast view, opening it, and then closing it. Then 
I got this error message: "An internal error has occured. Widget is disposed. 
See error log for more details."

I have not been able to repeat the problem.
